main event: An unidentified cigar-shaped object, resembling a dirigible, was observed approximately 8 miles north of Julien, Kentucky on 6 June 1954.
interesting points: The object disappeared and reappeared twice during the observation,The sighting lasted approximately 30 minutes and was observed using binoculars,The object was last sighted on 12 June 1954,Several witnesses reported similar sightings in the vicinity,No clear explanation was provided for the object, and further investigation was suggested.
witness description: an attorney, a housewife, and a farm hand were among the witnesses
